name: Santa, It's Cold Outside
description:
Controls: WASD to move

Goal: Get the highest score before Christmas comes

You will freeze if you stay there for too long. Go to the far left and run into the dock to warm Santa up. The more presents you collect before going to the dock, the higher combo you will have for your score. The more presents you collect before dropping them off at the dock, the heavier your bag will become, and the slower you will move.
